title:
Hi it's {{userName}}'s AI Assistant
Talk with me to know me better!
description: Select a topic or ask me anything about {{userName}}'s development expertise

questions.title: Technologies
questions.content: What are the main technologies and programming languages that {{userName}} masters?

questions.title: Projects
questions.content: Can you tell me about {{userName}}'s most significant projects and their technical challenges?

questions.title: Experience
questions.content: What is {{userName}}'s professional experience in web development?

questions.title: Motivation
questions.content: What drives {{userName}} as a developer and what are their career goals?

questions.title: Skills
questions.content: What are {{userName}}'s key strengths as a developer?

questions.title: Learning
questions.content: What is {{userName}}'s educational experience and what training has they undergone?
